page.title: 13THE MANOR HOUSE
page.content: problem one had lost its roof and had to have a new one.The workers also had to take down the towers down to put in new foundations and then rebuild them.Mr.Martin keeps discovering new things. Recently he discovered a staircase that would have lead up to the battlements,and a passage to the bottom of the tower.There is a door that has been there since the manor was built.Mr.Martin made a lead plaque to celebrate moving in.Between the towers was an arch that coaches went through but he has blocked it up.In 1490 there used to be 50-60 people living here.Originally there were more towers,now two and a half.He owns one and a half acres.They discovered the old well when the farmer was putting up fences.Mr Martin is not allowed to fish,swim or sail on the resevoir.
